seo.title: SignUp
seo.description: Sign up for a free account to get started with programming with 4Geeks

checkout.title: Code will set you free
checkout.description: The path to professional freedom is highly mentored, live and together.

in-waiting-list-title: You are in out waiting list
signup-thanks-text: Thanks for signing up to try 4Geeks. We'll be in touch when your seat is ready
your-address: Give us your address to find your new class
addres-info: We are not storing your address, but we will use this information to offer the best possible dates and schedules to study.
email-info: We will use it to give you access to your account.
phone-info: We will contact you via phone call only if necessary. (optional)
already-adquired-plan-description: You've had already acquired this plan before, you can't buy it again. Click below to see your subscriptions.

join-cohort.description: Click the button below to join the cohort and access the program's content.

card-declined: The card was declined, please try again with another card or contact your bank
payment-error: An unexpected error occurred during the payment process, please contact support

info.will-pay-monthly: You will pay ${{price}} dollars {{qty_months}} times, for a total of ${{total_amount}}. The first payment will be today and the next payment will be {{next_month}}.
info.will-pay-month: You will pay ${{price}} dollars {{qty_months}} times, for a total of ${{total_amount}}.
info.will-pay-now: You will pay ${{price} right now, no other charges apply in the future.
info.will-pay-per-month: You will subscribe and pay ${{price}} dollars every month
info.will-pay-per-quarter: You will subscribe and pay ${{price}} dollars every quarter
info.will-pay-per-half-year: You will subscribe and pay ${{price}} dollars every half year
info.will-pay-per-year: You will subscribe and pay ${{price}} dollars every year

validators.exp-min: Please specify a valid expiration date
validators.invalid-phone: Please specify a valid phone number
validators.termns-and-conditions-required: I accept to receive information to my email about coding workshops, events, courses, and other marketing materials. We'll never share your email,

no-date-available: We currently have no dates available for the location entered

alert-message.title: Already a member?
alert-message.description: It seems that you already have an account in 4geeks.com
alert-message.message3: forgot password to get a new one
alert-message.validate-email-description: We sent a confirmation email to: {{email}}, please check your email and click on the confirmation link.
alert-message.email-sent-to: We sent you a confirmation email to {{email}}!
alert-message.email-already-sent: You have a pending invitation sent less than 1 day ago, check your email

alert-message-validate-email.title: Verify email
alert-message-validate-email.description: You haven't validated your email yet, login to your email account and look for the invitation
alert-message-validate-email.description2: Don't forget to check your email spam inbox as well!

consumables.consumable-event-not-available: This event is not available for your subscription
consumables.consumable-mentorship-not-available: This mentorship is not available for your subscription
consumables.ran-out-of-events-text: You can purchase a event access bundle or purchase a plan here:
consumables.purchase-one-or-more-events: Purchase one or more event access
consumables.ran-out-of-mentorships-text: You can purchase a mentoring session bundle or purchase a plan here:
consumables.purchase-completed-title: You have successfully completed the purchase

select-service-of-plan.title: Which experience do you want to upgrade?
select-service-of-plan.description: We have plans with mentoring available for you, select one before continuing:
select-service-of-plan.no-plan-found-for-service: You don't have any subscription related to the following services:

basic-plan.hook-message: Start learning or improving your skills for free
basic-plan.title: No credit card required
basic-plan.description: Start learning and discover our amazing content and benefits

features.description: Hundreds of interactive exercises, projects, and lessons are available thanks to LearnPack, our interactive engine.
We offer a diverse range of courses across various technologies, providing you with opportunities to enhance your existing skills or delve into new ones.

premium-plan.hook-message: Learn at your own pace with feedback and live events
premium-plan.title: Premium member
premium-plan.description: All the content you need to become a hireable developer

features.description: We have many workshops and Live Events hosted by experts every week.
Our internally trained AI models will constantly review your code and give you feedback, advice as you code and more. Plus we have a technical support chat 24/7.
We have many workshops and Live Events hosted by experts every week.
Earn verifiable certificates as you complete each of the courses.
